TopicTitle: [0.22] B9 Aerospace Pack / R4.0c / New pods, IVAs, engines, fuselages & structures

Articles.Content: Im having trouble unpacking the mod, archive says that it is corupted and damaged, anyone else having this problem?

What's going on with the landing gear? I can't even get my plane off the runway without exploding due to gear bending, twisting or flipping my plane well before takeoff. I've tried every position I know and always end up with a crash.
SNM Struts? Bondage for our rockets? I hope the joke was intentional.

how much ram does this mod use? i've tried it yesterday, i've also used reduced texture size and still the mod uses about 1gb of ram. I usually run on 2.6 gb 2.7gb ksp.exe usage, with this mod installed i jumped over the critical 3.7gb and got a lot of crashes. any suggestion?
You could have a look at this : http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/59005-0-22-Release-1-Active-Memory-Reduction-Mod

What's going on with the landing gear? I can't even get my plane off the runway without exploding due to gear bending, twisting or flipping my plane well before takeoff. I've tried every position I know and always end up with a crash.

I had a problem like this also for a while. I found that I was not attaching the gear to a stable enough surface. I also started using this mod.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55657-0-22-Kerbal-Joint-Reinforcement-v1-4-2-Properly-Rigid-Part-Connections

Kerbal Joint Reinforcement, is worth it trust me. I have been able to cut down on the numbers of struts and part counts by a fair amount.

All of the my parts have have a strange color issue and they crash the game in the SPH. I tried re-downloading the mod but it didn't work. Does anyone know how to fix this?

Otherwise GREAT MOD!

Never mind, the problem was the half-res textures.

Edited November 22, 2013 by Downfeather6
Anyone else having issues with this pack on mac?
Is the linked file on Spaceport a complete download? I'm only getting 86 part files in the download's folder. None of the prebuilt craft work due to a lot of missing parts.

Every time I try to open the archive I get this message...

"! C:\Documents and Settings\kenny\My Documents\Downloads\uploads-2013-10-B9-Aerospace-Pack-R4-0c (1).zip: Unexpected end of archive"

Then when I try to extract the archive I get this message...

"! C:\Documents and Settings\kenny\My Documents\Downloads\uploads-2013-10-B9-Aerospace-Pack-R4-0c (1).zip: The archive is either in unknown format or damaged"

What do I do?

P.S. I'm using Winrar.

Every time i download the mod then enter the archive I get this message

"! C:\Documents and Settings\kenny\My Documents\Downloads\uploads-2013-10-B9-Aerospace-Pack-R4-0c (1).zip: Unexpected end of archive"

then, when I attempt to extract the archive i get this message

"! C:\Documents and Settings\kenny\My Documents\Downloads\uploads-2013-10-B9-Aerospace-Pack-R4-0c (1).zip: The archive is either in unknown format or damaged"

What do I do to resolve this issue?

I'm using Winrar btw.
Check the intended size of the archive, with the size of the archive you have. 10 to 1 the download cut off part way through.....

What's going on with the landing gear? I can't even get my plane off the runway without exploding due to gear bending, twisting or flipping my plane well before takeoff. I've tried every position I know and always end up with a crash.

I have the same issue lately (with the reinforced connections mod + FAR + some others). The stock landing gear seems to work fine. I'm sure that it is some sort of addon incompatibility issue since it appeared after updating some addons. Before that i could usually take off if i was careful enough. Now the friction seems to stick the gear to the ground, almost impossible to move. Was too lazy to investigate though

I have the same issue lately (with the reinforced connections mod + FAR + some others). The stock landing gear seems to work fine. I'm sure that it is some sort of addon incompatibility issue since it appeared after updating some addons. Before that i could usually take off if i was careful enough. Now the friction seems to stick the gear to the ground, almost impossible to move. Was too lazy to investigate though

I had the same problem with FAR, I reinstalled B9 after FAR and the sticky landing gear issue is gone

Anyone else having issues with this pack on mac?

By problems you mean graphic corruption? Try using the lower-res textures in the pack.

B9 is causing my game to crash while in the load screen every time the game is loading squad/spaces/podcockpit/internal

what's up with this and how do I fix it?
Hi this looks amazing but every time i go to download it ,the download button takes me to a page that says this file does not exist ,i don't know what to do please help if you can !
If it says squad/, then I'm pretty sure it's one of the vanilla files.

It crashed when using the full version so I installed the reduced textures exactly as specified. I merged the B9_Aerospace (reduced_textures) with the B9_Aerospace (full textures) folder and selected replace all. Now when KSP starts none of the B9 Aerospace parts are shown in the VAB. They did show up a few times when using the full texture version, before it crashed.
Bac9, can you make the Goo Container and Material Bay in your Radial Science Stuff style?

DaMichel

Seems I'm not the only one with issues with B9 landing gear. Actually saw the front landing gear slide back on the Mk2 component I had it attached to, then it stutters till the plane reaches just over 30 m/s, when said landing gear pogos the nose up before I have enough airspeed to takeoff, then slamming the nose down on the runway. I'm going to try un-installing FAR to see if it fixes the issue for me.
what up with the landing gear? stock gears work fine but when I attempt to use any of the b9 gears it's like the plane gets glued to the runway.

Seems I'm not the only one with issues with B9 landing gear. Actually saw the front landing gear slide back on the Mk2 component I had it attached to, then it stutters till the plane reaches just over 30 m/s, when said landing gear pogos the nose up before I have enough airspeed to takeoff, then slamming the nose down on the runway. I'm going to try un-installing FAR to see if it fixes the issue for me.

Well FAR's not the issue...
Seems like there are several issues that are turning out to be pretty common with the mod. I wonder what happened...
